story:
Once upon a time in a beautiful village in Vietnam, there lived a little mouse named Linh. Linh was a curious and adventurous mouse who loved exploring the world around her.

One day, as Linh was wandering through the rice fields, she stumbled upon a magical lantern hidden beneath a lotus flower. The lantern glowed with a warm, golden light, and Linh felt a sense of wonder and excitement wash over her.

Intrigued by the lantern, Linh decided to bring it back to her cozy little home in the hollow of a tree. As night fell, Linh lit the lantern, and to her amazement, it began to float and dance in the air, casting a beautiful kaleidoscope of colors all around the room.

The lantern told Linh stories of faraway lands, of dragons and fairies, of bravery and friendship. Linh listened with wide eyes and a heart full of dreams, feeling as though she was being whisked away on a magical adventure.

As the night grew late, the lantern gently lulled Linh to sleep with its soothing glow and enchanting tales. Linh drifted off into a peaceful slumber, her heart filled with warmth and joy.

And so, every night, Linh would light the lantern, and together they would embark on wondrous journeys through the realms of imagination, exploring the endless possibilities of the world.

And from that day on, Linh and the magical lantern became the best of friends, sharing bedtime stories and creating memories that would last a lifetime.

And so, dear child, may your dreams be as magical as Linh's adventures with the lantern, and may you always remember that the power of imagination knows no bounds.

Goodnight, sweet child, and may your dreams be filled with wonder and delight.
